people.about: My research is in group decision making, I'm studying the relationship between computational complexity and demonstrability.

My research interests are mobility and social data analysis, and I also like to keep an eye on data privacy. I currently work on three main topics: shared transportation, wisdom of the crowd in financial networks, and privacy in tracking technologies
As a PhD student at the Big Data Lab I'm passionate about applying computational methods to social sciences and contributing to the findings of new methods to deal with real-life problems.
